About 180 UofT

  1. Home
  2. About

180 UofT History

University of Toronto (UofT) was the first post-secondary school in Canada to have a branch of 180 Degrees Consulting. In 2016, Kristen Shi founded the local branch of 180 Degrees Consulting at UofT.

The humble beginnings of 180 Degrees consulting began with a team of 5, which grew to 20, which grew to 50 members strong today. Raning from an internal team to support the consultants work such as the Marketing Committee or the Finance Committee to the Consultant teams themselves.

Consulting is not just a field for Business students. We believe that diversity is our strength. We have first-year Rotman students, third-year Industrial Engineering students, fourth-year Economics and Geography students, Public Policyy students, Masters students, Part-Time students, Exchange students from abroad. We believe a student from any field has the potential to face a challenging case and make a positive impact on their community.
